alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 10 at 3:31PM CDT until April 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning Continues This Evening, Red Flag Warning in Effect for Monday, and a Fire Weather Watch is in Effect on Tuesday... ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 005, 017, 060, 061, 062, 072, 073, 074, 082, 083 AND 084... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 8 PM CDT MONDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 005, 017, 060, 061, 062, 072, 073, 074, 082, 083 AND 084... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 005, 017, 060, 061, 062, 072, 073, 074, 082, 083 AND 084... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 005 Phillips and Fire Weather Zone 017 Rooks. In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 060 Dawson, Fire Weather Zone 061 Buffalo, Fire Weather Zone 062 Hall, Fire Weather Zone 072 Gosper, Fire Weather Zone 073 Phelps, Fire Weather Zone 074 Kearney, Fire Weather Zone 082 Furnas, Fire Weather Zone 083 Harlan and Fire Weather Zone 084 Franklin. * WINDS...For today, northwest winds 20 to 30 MPH with gusts to 40 MPH. On Monday, south winds 15 to 20 MPH with gusts to 30 MPH. And on Tuesday, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
